summary: This is an email from Allison Stoddart of WilmerHale law firm, transmitting a production of documents on behalf of client JPMorgan Chase to the SDNY (Southern District of New York). The email includes an attached letter and instructions for accessing the materials.

persons.name: Allison Stoddart

connections.description: Stoddart is sending a production on behalf of her client, JPMorgan Chase.

events.title: JPMorgan Chase Document Production to SDNY
events.description: WilmerHale attorney Allison Stoddart transmits a production of documents from JPMorgan Chase to the Southern District of New York via email with an attached letter.

keyFacts: JPMorgan Chase, through its law firm WilmerHale, was producing documents to the SDNY in November 2021.
The transmission was handled by attorney Allison Stoddart via email with secure access instructions.
The document is part of the Epstein case data set, indicating the production is related to the Epstein investigation.
